summary.zh: 月下金沙漫水天，尸群踏潮卷沙尘。
summary.en: Beneath the moon, golden sands flood the sky. Zombie swarm trample the rising tide, stirring sandstorms of war.

summary.zh: 当怀表再次走动，裂隙悄然开启。打开异界之信，找到异界之物，在时间错位之前！
summary.en: When the watch ticks, a rift opens. Open the otherworld letters, find the "artifacts" before the time warp!
